summary: When a young owl is abducted by an evil Owl army, he must escape with new-found friends and seek the legendary Guardians to stop the menace.
cast: Emily Barclay|Abbie Cornish|Essie Davis|Adrienne DeFaria|Joel Edgerton|Deborra-Lee Furness|Sacha Horler|Bill Hunter|Ryan Kwanten|Anthony LaPaglia|Miriam Margolyes|Helen Mirren|Sam Neill|Barry Otto|Richard Roxburgh|Geoffrey Rush|Angus Sampson|Jim Sturgess|Hugo Weaving|David Wenham|Leigh Whannell|Gareth Young|Anthony Cogin|Mandy Bishop|Trent Dalzell|James Evans|Lelda Kapsis|Andrew Gray McDonnell|John Xintavelonis|Alison Scoon
title: Ga'Hoole La leyenda de los guardianes
